attributes.action: SUPPLY FREE WOMEN’S SANITARY PRODUCTS. Empower a girl’s life.
attributes.additional_details: In order to live we pay for many things such as food, clothes, rent and other bills. But as a women we have to pay extra to deal with something we didn’t choose to have. We belief it’s unfair how we have no choice over these things and having to pay more than men have to is unjust. Also if a girl isn’t comfortable financially to buy pads or tampons it’s unfair that she should struggle for things that are out of her hands. No woman should have to ever go through that.
attributes.background: We want the government to provide and support us with the necessities we need to survive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which are open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704841
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710759
